markdownRemark.html:
Ingredients

Safeway

  • 3 pounds beef chuck roast
  • 3 (1 ounce) packages dry Italian salad dressing mix
  • 1 (16 ounce) jar pepperoncini peppers
  • 8 hamburger buns, split
  • 1 cup of water

Cooking Equipment

  • Slow cooker

Cooking Instructions

  1. Place the roast into a slow cooker, and season with Italian dressing mix.
  2. Pour in the water. Cover, and cook on High for 6 to 7 hours.
  3. During the last hour, shred the meat with two forks - if it does not shred easily, cook longer.
  4. Add the peppers, and as much of the juice as you like for additional flavor. Serve on buns.

frontmatter.title: Italian Beef Sandwiches
